response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This unique item holds immense value not just monetarily but also in terms of its potential impact on your endeavors. Given its significance, I propose a special introductory offer to you. For a limited time, you can secure this product for $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,500,000 and is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for quality. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
